titleStmt.title: The sentinels remonstrance or, A vindication of the souldiers to the people of this Common-wealth, &c. laying open the manifold wrongs, abuses, and cheats put upon them, and the people who have duely payd their taxes, to the enriching of some, the severall clamities and ruine both of people and souldiery. / By W.B.
titleStmt.author: W. B.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
